attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I decided to download the app to see how biased his app would be in news especially since he claims to not spread fake news. Everything said on this app is biased and fake news. Articles are incorrect on information and it just makes me see him more as a hypocrite than ever.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: For some reason I bought this app think it will be funny,but all it was is ignorant nonsense. You should only get this if you have one brain cell left in your entire body. The app is so bad I’m surprised it got passed the first stages. It is so sad that let any one in office. I’m sorry, typo. On the App Store.

attributes.title: Black Lives Matter
attributes.review: Downloaded it as a joke turns out it was really slow and there was this ugly orange hybrid thingy idk man it gave me nightmares. It took for EVER to load and ugh not worth it wish I could give it less stars. Also Donald Trump is a white supremacist and that’s not the vibe bro. Over all I hated this app and this experience 🤮✨

attributes.title: The worst app I have ever seen
attributes.review: This app took a week to download even though I have perfectly working wifi. Also the app was so hard to work and it always glitched. It really freaked me out because it started flashing every single time I opened the app! I do not recommend.

attributes.title: This app is horrible!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app is so bad that it must be taken down immediately!! If you want to take down Tiktok, gen z isn’t going down without a fight. Let us have Tiktok, and you can have your app. Take down Tiktok, we’re dragging this app down with us. I’ll let you think about it now, toodles!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TRASHY APP
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever had so far! the glitches and crashes it has is just unacceptable. freak you donald trump your irrelevant. anyways back to rating this app. it needs to get upgraded because it is WAY TOO GLITCHY for me to even use it. when i open the app it gets so laggy and weird.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!
attributes.review: This app is pure torture!! I spent days waiting for it to download but no, it didn’t work until days later. When I opened the app it made my whole phone glitch and then it open pornhub randomly. I tried to delete it but it got stuck on my home screen. What a disgrace!

attributes.title: caused me depression 😵🗡🪓
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what all the talk was about and i instantly felt a overwhelming wave of sadness. the thought of people being happy about this just made me sad. i can’t believe people can use this app and feel great about themselves. this app has sent me to a mental hospital . i barely could get up in the morning. i had no motivation in live. i knew it was the app because life was great before i got it. i would not recommend this app to anybody who is living life great, or anyone who has a working brain.

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED BUT NOT SURPRISED
attributes.review: when i got this app i honestly thought it would just be full of dumb boomers but honestly i was even more disappointed than i already was with trump existing. the app kept crashing, but i was glad it did because i didn’t fluke it anyways. overall trump is dumb and selfish. 😪

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app on my phone and you wouldn’t believe what happened,a camera came out of my phone and started watching me,luckily I have a backup phone,so I felt I had to tell you all this,be warned,if hew wants to take down tik tok,he has to take down this app,I don’t feel safe anymore,somone HELP PLEASE
